name: Ryan Mulligan
title: Front-end Engineer + Creative Developer

info.label: hey@ryanmulligan.dev
info.url: mailto:hey@ryanmulligan.dev?subject=I discovered your resume, tell me more

introduction:
I'm a creative front-end engineer with over a decade of experience building for the web. I've developed a well-rounded skillset servicing both product and marketing teams. My back catalog of roles range from individual contribution to management, team building, and leadership.

I perpetually advocate for modern web standards, embrace the web platform, and believe in the rule of least powerâ€”use the simplest language to do the job well, then scale as it becomes necessary. My priorities are influenced by empathy: lift up those around me so we may succeed together, always care for the end user, and deliver a performant, inclusive, and accessible web.

roles.title: Marketing Engineering Lead
roles.description: Engineering team leader building web properties within the marketing ecosystem. Managed team and web projects, developed new, creative facets for our sites, architected content schemas for our CMS, and connected multiple datasets to our front end templates and visual editor. Actively worked on site rebuild, foundational design token system and component architecture while also maintaining legacy codebases. Lead team enablement strategies to streamline campaign creation.

roles.title: Manager, UI Engineering
roles.description: UI engineering product team lead. Management role extended previous senior level duties to include people management, working with recruitment in the hiring process, and providing direction towards organizational growth.

roles.title: Senior UI Engineer
roles.description: Front-end engineer on the Pass UX and List Architecture team. Built our latest front-end design system, developed consumer-facing React application for property listings and trip collections, and evolved user experience towards a more stable, performant, and accessible product.

roles.title: Senior Frontend Developer
roles.description: Helped build and manage a development at new remote location. Lead web engineer on multiple projects, presented project build specs, estimated feature scope, and worked directly with many clients as a technical liason. On management side, I mentored junior-level team members both in office and virtual.

roles.title: Software Dev Engineer II
roles.description: Core member of Global UI Engineering Team focused on toolkit of components used across applications. Led the Front-end Improvements Team, providing engineering team guidance, development direction, and code contributions for quality and consistency across app presentation layers.

roles.title: Senior Design Engineer
roles.description: Built responsive product prototypes concentrated around business travel consumer needs. Helped conduct user studies and design towards rapid, iterative processes for UX feature A/B testing. Contributed to global UI toolkit and to align product with design standards.

roles.title: Senior Frontend Developer
roles.description: Front-end web development, Drupal site theming, admin/client-facing site configuration, custom module development, and some back-end development. Estimated new projects and feature scope. Information architecture and content schemas for new site builds.

awards.title: The Most Hearted of 2022

awards.title: Big Dreamer Award: Most Innovative and Creative
awards.description: Awarded for work done in 2020 based on team votes.

skills.content: My primary goal is to build delightful, inclusive online experiences using the foundational building blocks of the web. Develop systems that are straightforward, extensible, and well-documented. Use the simplest language suitable for the job before jumping into more complex frameworks. Keep code portable and reusable. Below highlights some general areas of expertise and familiarity.
